column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jolene - Thanks for the great review. In the future
column2: you might try our Tonkotsu Assari or Tonkotsu White
column3: both of which have a lighter
column4: less dense pork broth. As far as the seasoned egg is concerned
column5: I fear you may have simply received an egg that missed quality control -- we serve and prepare thousands of eggs a day
column7: we experience a small margin of error in spite of our best efforts to the contrary. In the future
column8: please ask your server for anything that is off
column9: or doesn't seem right. Our motto is this: "If it's not great -- REMAKE." Simple as that.
